profile.name: Nakul Bhardwaj
profile.title: Software Engineer & Quantitative Researcher
profile.intro: Software engineer and quantitative researcher who somehow convinced computers to trade better than me. Leading quant strategies at Cosmikcapital while also teaching AI to be less dramatic and backends to scale without complaining.

experience.role: Tech Lead Quantitative Research & Trading Systems
experience.description: Lead quantitative trading strategies development with focus on statistical edge and risk management. Design backtesting frameworks and live trading systems. Apply ML and optimization for performance enhancement.

Started as Software Engineer developing backend services with Node.js, Express, Nest.JS, and AWS deployment. Advanced to AI/ML role fine-tuning Whisper for transcription, building AI inference systems, and integrating AI models using Python tech stack.

projects.name: Cloud-assist
projects.description: AI-powered terminal assistant for DevOps built with Go CLI and Python LangGraph agent. Provides natural language command translation with secure approval for cloud automation.

projects.name: Zipline-engine-backtesting-wrapper
projects.description: Backtesting framework wrapping Zipline-Reloaded with MLflow integration for hyperparameter tuning and performance analytics in systematic trading research.

backend: TypeScript (Express.js, Nest.JS, Prisma, Drizzle ORM, Socket.IO)
Go (Gin, Fiber, Echo, Chi, gRPC, Gorilla WebSocket)
